channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Guides to help you tackle your New Year's resolutions
item.description: From building your strength to tackling credit card debt, NPR's Life Kit has a newsletter journey to help you tackle your New Year's resolution.

item.title: Dozens presumed dead in fire at Swiss Alps bar during New Year's celebration
item.description: Dozens of people are presumed dead and about 100 injured, most of them seriously, following a fire at a Swiss Alps bar during a New Year's celebration...

item.title: Warren Buffett officially retires as Berkshire Hathway's CEO
item.description: The legendary 95-year-old investor spent decades building his company into one of the world's largest and most powerful. Now Greg Abel is taking it ov...

item.title: Crypto soared in 2025 — and then crashed. Now what?
item.description: For most of 2025, cryptocurrencies such as bitcoin surged as President Trump vowed to make the U.S. a crypto leader. But now, a severe sell-off has sh...

item.title: Rideshare union rights, social media limits and other state laws taking effect Jan. 1
item.description: Every new year, public media reporters across the country bring us some of the new state laws taking effect where they are. Here are six in 2026.

item.title: Social media fuelled Mamdani's rise. Can he keep the momentum as New York mayor?
item.description: To succeed in office he will need to keep his supporters engaged with day-to-day governing, experts say.

item.title: Exclusive discounts from CBS Mornings Deals
item.description: On this edition of CBS Mornings Deals, we show you items that might just become essentials in your everyday life. Visit cbsdeals.com to take advantage...

item.title: Several dozen feared dead in Swiss ski resort bar fire
item.description: Around 100 are also injured in fire at Crans-Montana Swiss ski resort bar Le Constellation.

item.title: New discovery may challenge theory Vikings built first Irish towns - researcher
item.description: Dr Dirk Brandherm and his colleagues have identified more than 600 suspected house platforms in the Brusselstown Ring.

item.title: What we know about the Switzerland ski resort fire
item.description: Several dozen people are presumed to have died in the fire at a New Year party in the resort of Crans-Montana.

item.title: Price hikes hit ACA health insurance plans as subsidies expire
item.description: Enhanced tax credits that have helped Americans offset the cost of Affordable Care Act health insurance for the last four years expired overnight.

item.title: Trump administration delays tariff increases on furniture, kitchen cabinets
item.description: The one-year delay comes as President Trump has rolled back some other import duties amid affordability concerns.

item.title: Judge voids decision to end legal status of 60,000 immigrants

item.title: Netherlands police face 'unprecedented' New Year's violence
item.description: Reports of fireworks and other explosives being thrown are widespread across the country.

item.title: Pope starts 2026 with prayer for countries "bloodied by conflict"
item.description: Pope Leo XIV celebrated a New Year's Day Mass in St. Peter's Basilica and then delivered a special noontime prayer from his studio overlooking the pia...

item.title: Zohran Mamdani sworn in as New York City mayor at historic subway station
Cities around the world welcome 2026 with thunderous fireworks and heightened security

item.title: These bipartisan bills were noncontroversial — until Trump vetoed them
